Sentencas: A novel integrated system is proposed which combines biomass gasification, chemical looping combustion, solid oxide fuel cell system and a steam power cycle.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis is done for effective parameters to analyze the performance of the integrated system and investigation of the optimal operating condition.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Because of some restrictions in the integrated system experiments, a chemical process simulator is used for analysis of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Products of this process are high-purity hydrogen and electrical power which are produced by chemical looping and solid oxide fuel cell (and a power cycle) respectively.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: The net efficiency of the system reaches to 55.8% with 100% carbon dioxide capture.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell operates at 850 degrees C and 12 bar.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Chemical looping system uses Calcium oxide metal oxide as oxygen carrier.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration

Sentencas: Also carbonator, calcinator and hydrator reactors operating temperature are 800 degrees C 850 degrees C and 650 degrees C respectively.
Titulo: Introducing an integrated chemical looping hydrogen production, inherent carbon capture and solid oxide fuel cell biomass fueled power plant process configuration
